references.paper_title: On the surprising behavior of distance metrics in high dimensional spaces
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the discussion of high-dimensional similarity metrics, a critical aspect of comparing deep networks.

references.paper_title: Dropout as a Bayesian approximation: Representing model uncertainty in deep learning
references.reason: This work is highly influential in Bayesian deep learning by establishing dropout as a method for approximating model uncertainty.

references.paper_title: Simple and scalable predictive uncertainty estimation using deep ensembles
references.reason: Deep ensembles are a cornerstone of Bayesian deep learning, and this paper offers a practical and effective method for uncertainty estimation.

references.paper_title: Similarity of neural network representations revisited
references.reason: Centered Kernel Alignment (CKA), introduced in this paper, is the core metric used in the current work for comparing the similarity of deep networks.
Hyperspherical energy (HE), a key component of the proposed method, is formally introduced and analyzed in this highly relevant work.
